name: Mafia Headquarters
description: A concealed Mafia headquarters hidden beneath Cassandra's train station platform, accessed through a disguised dock. This location serves as the operational center for the local Mafia and the base of power for its leader, Ben Cleo.

snapshot.name: Hidden Dock and Mafia Base
snapshot.location: Beneath the Cassandra Train Station Platform
snapshot.description: Behind the false façade of a quiet train platform lies a secret dock area leading into the Mafia headquarters. The space is utilitarian and guarded, designed for clandestine meetings and illegal operations. Investigators who reach this location are immediately at risk of confrontation but may also gain crucial leverage through negotiation.

characters.name: Ben Cleo
characters.notes: The leader of the local Mafia. Calm, pragmatic, and confident. He insists he is not responsible for the killings at the Reindeer Bar and is willing to negotiate with investigators under strict conditions.

clues.clueText: The headquarters is directly connected to the train station platform via a hidden dock.
reveals: The true purpose of the train station platform
The Mafia’s method of covert movement

clues.clueText: Ben Cleo claims that the real power behind Cassandra is a man named Padriche, and that Padriche's actions threaten Mafia interests.
reveals: Padriche as a major hidden antagonist

conditions.description: Dim artificial lighting, creating heavy shadows throughout the headquarters.
Echoing water sounds from the dock mixed with low, tense voices.

events: Investigators are confronted by Mafia members upon arrival.
Negotiation between Ben Cleo and the investigators regarding secrecy and mutual interests.

exits.description: A concealed route back to the platform above.

snapshot.keeperNotes: This scene should emphasize tension rather than immediate violence. Ben Cleo is dangerous but rational; he prefers negotiation if it protects his interests. If investigators betray his trust or reveal the secret of the platform, the Mafia will become a persistent hostile force.
permanentChanges: If investigators strike a deal with Ben Cleo, the Mafia may become a temporary ally.
If negotiations fail, the Mafia becomes openly hostile toward the investigators.

connections.description: The Mafia headquarters can only be accessed through the hidden dock beneath the train station platform.
Information obtained here directs investigators toward Padriche as a key figure behind the events in Cassandra.
